item.description:
We're always outnumbered at co-ed events, so this gathering is just for the women of the group! Let's get together to have a drink and enjoy each other's company.

We'll meet in the bar area near the entrance. Hopefully we can get one of the big tables.

I'll send my cell number to Yes and Maybe RSVPs a few days before to use in case you have trouble finding us.

The event info will also be posted on the Boston Republican Party Meetup Group and will be sent to members of the HUB Republican Women group. It's also posted on Facebook. Feel free to spread the word to other Republican women you know and bring your friends.

There are several parking lots in the neighborhood and the nearest MBTA stop is Central Square on the Red Line.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the bar area and try to get one of the big tables.
item.name: Republican Women Meetup
